column2: "Hen na akasakasa nye ɔko fi ba hom mu? Ana ommfi hom akɔndɔ a odzi hom honam mu aperper no?"
"Hom hwehwɛ ndzɛmba bi naaso hom nnya; ntsi hom dzi ewu na hom enyi ber
column3: naaso hom nsa nnka; hom ko na hom ham

column4: ama hom aahwer no hom akɔndɔdze ho."

column3: ana hom nnyim dɛ wiadze anyɛnkoyɛ yɛ tan a wɔdze tan Nyankopɔn? Dɛm ntsi obiara a ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye wiadze yɛ nyɛnko no

column2: "Ana hom dwen dɛ kyerɛw no kasa kwa? Ana sunsum a ɔmaa ɔbɛtsenaa hɛn mu no
"Na ɔma adom pii mbom. Dɛm ntsi kyerɛwsɛm no se
column3: Nyame siw ahopɔwfo kwan na ɔma ahobrɛadzefo adom."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mfa homho nhyɛ Nyankopɔn ase; hom mbɔ mbɔdzen nsiw abɔnsam kwan
"Hom ntwe mpin Nyankopɔn na ɔbɔtwe epin hom. Hom nhohor hom nsa
column3: hom ndzebɔnyɛfo; hom ntsew hom akoma mu
column4: hom a hom adwen ebien ebien."
na hom nsu: hom mma hom serew ndan awerɛhow

column2: "Hom mbrɛ homho adze wɔ Ewuradze enyim na ɔbɛma hom do."

column3: mma hom nnkeka hom ho nsɛmbɔn. Nyia ɔka no nua ho nsɛmbɔn
column4: anaa obu no nua atsɛn no
column6: na obu mbra no atsɛn; na sɛ ibu mbra no atsɛn a

column2: "Mbrahyɛfo nye tsɛmbuafo kortsee na ɔwɔ hɔ
column3: ɔno nye nyia otum dɛ ɔgye nkwa na ɔsɛɛ no. Na ɔwo woana nye wo na ibu wo nyɛnko atsɛn?"

column4: Ndɛ anaa ɔkyena yɛbɔkɔ kurow yi mu ekedzi afrenhyia

column2: "naaso hom nnyim dza ɔkyena obesi. Hom nkwa nye bɛn? Hom tse dɛ ehubɔhubɔw a oyi noho kakra na nkyii ɔhera."

column3: hom tuw homho wɔ hom ahopɔw mu; na dɛm ntuw yi nyina yɛ bɔn."

column2: "Na nyia onyim papa yɛ na ɔnnyɛ no
